channel.title: Asylguiden on Life and Shell
channel.description: Recent content in Asylguiden on Life and Shell

item.title: Getting django docker prod ready with jenkins (part 1 the build)
item.description: So i have some django webb projects and now its time to get my django apps prod ready with docker. My plan is to with jenkins build my django apps (soon start a docker of the app and run some test but that will be later) make a docker image and send that to the docker cloud. Then a can download the docker image on my prod server and start the app.

item.title: Installing Asylguiden on centos Server
item.description: One of my own prodjects are Asylguiden. Its A python publish system build with django, Mysql and mongodb. You can find the code here on github https://github.com/mattiashem/asylguiden Asylguiden also works with wsgi for python and apache for displaying content here is my own how to for downloadning and setting up asylguiden on a production server. 1. Setting up server for hosing Centos yum install httpd mod_ssl git wget python-setuptools mod_wsgi
